body: Makes sense. I see 3-4 places where we check if `function` is `nullptr`. I'll give `Edge` an `is_valid()` method, because I feel like `if (edge) { ... }` is not as immediately obvious as `if (edge.is_valid()) { ... }`.
body_html: Makes sense. I see 3-4 places where we check if function is nullptr. I'll give Edge an is_valid() method, because I feel like if (edge) { ... } is not as immediately obvious as if (edge.is_valid()) { ... }.
body_text: Makes sense. I see 3-4 places where we check if function is nullptr. I'll give Edge an is_valid() method, because I feel like if (edge) { ... } is not as immediately obvious as if (edge.is_valid()) { ... }.
